name: That's Mahjong!
description: That's Mahjong! is a Solitaire Mahjong tile matching game, where the purpose is to match tiles of the same type, or any two season tiles. How much karma can you gather?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Any Dual-Core CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: A display monitor with a 16:9 resolution is recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Any Dual-Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any dedicated GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: A display monitor with a 16:9 resolution is recommended
